sentence.Network_en: 'Why, in the name of Davy Jones,'said he,'is Dr Livesey mad?'
sentence.Network_cn: “ 我的海王爷, ” 他说, “ 利维塞大夫准是疯了 吧 ? ”

sentence.Network_en: How is it that your composition is exactly the same with Davy's?
sentence.Network_cn: “你的作文和戴维的完全一样,这是怎么一回事? ”

sentence.Network_en: The ship and all her crew went to Davy Jones's locker.
sentence.Network_cn: 该船及其全部水手都沉到海底去了.
